channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Anti Social Behaviour, Drugs, broken glass & litter, 25th June
item.description:
Disruptive and Anti Social behaviour reported and experienced on Drawdock Rd. Ongoing issue and appears to be escalating.

item.title: Flytip, 25th June
item.description:
Email received by CSC inbox 24/06/25 12:47 Hi You have received a request via Love Clean Streets to remedy an issue within your Service Area Fly-tipping Lat/Long - 51.4277385461682, 0.0410840660333633 what3words - tags.twigs.rises Nearest address - 155 Castleton Road, Mottingham, London, SE9 4DE Extra location information if given - Pile of flytipped rubbish in woods, near entrance. Please remove Reference - 4812784
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Castleton Road, Elmstead, London

item.title: Grass verges need cutting URGENTLY, 25th June
item.description:
Grass verges in the lower part of Mountview Road where it joins Chislehurst Road, along with the grass verge opposite in Chislehurst Road (outside the Cricketers pub) are over a foot high and need cutting URGENTLY. I believe that the council has a schedule for this work but it looks as though the work was missed whenever it was last due to be done.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chislehurst Road, Crofton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Northumberland Heath Park behind 20 - 21 The Drive, 25th June
item.description:
Work men have left rubbish after fixing sink hole dry branches and cut hedges have been left about 3 months, just down from the ruby club. Please can this be cleared.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Drive, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Infront of 15 Charlotte street, 25th June
item.description:
There were no notice given to us as a business about the roadworks currently ongoing which has been causing a lot of nose throughout the day. Our business is severely affected with guests not wanting to sit outside on our terrace, and noise complaints received by our guests. The works started at the end of Windmill street and have worked their way towards and are now on Charlotte street hotel.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Windmill Street, Fitzrovia, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bags of leaves left behind, 25th June
item.description:
White sacks of leaves have been left behind by the street cleaner. they have been here for the past month now - they were left by no.6 and no.8. can these please be removed.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stamford Grove West, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead tree in verge for the last year, 25th June
item.description:
I reported this before and it says problem is fixed but nothing has been done - the dead young tree is still there. This needs to be removed and replaced - thanks It’s on the verge outside 19 Petts Wood Rd Petts Wood BR5 1JT

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Petts Wood Road, Poverest, Orpington, London

item.title: Glass over the pavement and road, 25th June
item.description:
There is loads of glass all over the pavement and the road. It looks like a car has been broken into the problem now is you have children that scooters to school and lots of children in the local area that use that area that are not treading in glass, which then becomes dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mayfield Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Council housing rubbish flowing on to the pavement, 25th June
item.description:
